mapper.delete: delete from registration where model_category_id=#{modelCategoryId} and date=#{date}
mapper.select: select r.registration_id,r.status,r.visit_start_time,r.visit_end_time,mc.category_name from registration r join model_category mc on r.model_category_id=mc.model_category_id where r.date =#{date} and r.doctor_id=#{doctorId} order by r.visit_start_time desc
